alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Caddo; Canadian; Grady (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 3:44AM CDT until August 08 at 4:30AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Grady County in central Oklahoma... Northeastern Caddo County in southwestern Oklahoma... Southeastern Blaine County in northwestern Oklahoma... Western Canadian County in central Oklahoma... * Until 430 AM CDT. * At 343 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles east of Geary, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... El Reno, Hinton, Union City, Minco, Geary, Calumet, Bridgeport, Concho, and Cedar Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
